developer projects.title: SUYOP (Summer Youth Opportunities)
description: Created a website that showcases extracurricular opportunities for high school students in the Toronto area.
The student user can filter through the displayed options by category, location, and time commitment.
Currently leading a four-person team to market SUYOP, which included designing posters and business cards that we distributed at targeted information events.
Used bootstrap, HTML, javascript, and CSS.

developer projects.title: Pngball
description: Co-created an installable Java-based two-dimensional pinball game.
Implemented a 2D physics engine, which features multiple object collision and acceleration.

developer projects.title: Lawssons
description: Developed an organizational tool in Java for managing swimming instructor lesson plans.
Through a graphical user interface, the swimming instructor can input, save, modify, and print custom lesson plans.

work experience.title: Lifeguard
description: Oversaw the safety of pool patrons, and ensured pool equipment was properly maintained.
